titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the President's exercise of authority to suspend the debt limit, as submitted under section 1002(b) of the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014 on October 17, 2013.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 223 pursuant to Sec. 1002 of Public Law 113-46.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure made in Senate.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 220.

bill.summary: 10/28/2013--Introduced. Disapproves of the President's exercise of authority to suspend the debt limit.
